attributes.action: Debate if the Prime Ministers withdrawal agreement  is treason
attributes.background:
As the UK is giving away Tax and Lawmaking decisions to a foreign entity, which the UK has no representational how can the  Prime Minister withdrawal agreement not tantamount to treason!
Parliament needs an urgent debate of how they are not committing treason!

rejection.details: The interpretation of the law (deciding whether the law has been broken in a specific case) is the responsibility of the courts, which are independent of the UK Government or Parliament.
